snippet.title: A Pretty "Bun" Playdate Game! | Pikki Rikki Trailer
snippet.description:
My first game to ever publicly release, and a "bun", or fun, one at that! Check out just what's happening, in Pikki Rikki!

Pikki Rikki is a platformer, exclusive to the Playdate handheld! In Pikki Rikki, you play through speedy, time-based levels, collecting coins and picking plants! Check out the link below for more about it: 

https://coleplusgames.itch.io/pikki-rikki
